topics.title: Home Row Keys
topics.instruction: Place your fingers on A S D F J K L ; and press each key when prompted.

topics.title: Two Letter Words
topics.instruction: Type simple two-letter words using home-row letters.

topics.title: Three Letter Words
topics.instruction: Type these three-letter words slowly and correctly.

topics.title: Mouse Clicks
topics.instruction: Practice left click, right click, and double-click on targets.

topics.title: Drag and Drop
topics.instruction: Drag small shapes to their matching outlines.

topics.title: Simple Words
topics.instruction: Type these simple 3–4 letter words clearly.

topics.title: Common Sentences
topics.instruction: Type each sentence exactly as shown, including spaces.

topics.title: Phrases Practice
topics.instruction: Type short simple phrases; watch spacing and capitals.

topics.title: Timed Drill (3 min)
topics.instruction: Type the listed words as many times as you can in 3 minutes.

topics.title: Home Row Drill
topics.instruction: Repeat the home row letters, build speed and accuracy.

topics.title: Two & Three Letter Words
topics.instruction: Type mixed 2–3 letter words using the home row.

topics.title: Five Short Words
topics.instruction: Type these five short words clearly.

topics.title: Precision Clicks
topics.instruction: Click accurately on small targets, practice double-click speed.

topics.title: Typing Short Sentences
topics.instruction: Type short sentences, paying attention to capitalization and spacing.

topics.title: Simple Phrases
topics.instruction: Type the phrases slowly and accurately.

topics.title: Longer Words (5 letters)
topics.instruction: Practice typing five-letter words to grow vocabulary.

topics.title: Speed Drill (5 min)
topics.instruction: Type the supplied words and short phrases repeatedly for 5 minutes.

topics.title: Home Row Speed Drill
topics.instruction: Type home row letters with more speed and less looking.

topics.title: Simple Words Practice
topics.instruction: Type common easy words accurately.

topics.title: Five 5-letter Words
topics.instruction: Type these 5-letter words to expand vocabulary and finger control.

topics.title: Clicking Games
topics.instruction: Click targets accurately and practice drag interactions.

topics.title: Typing Sentences
topics.instruction: Type short sentences smoothly, including punctuation.

topics.title: Phrases & Clauses
topics.instruction: Type phrases and short clauses correctly.

topics.title: Paragraph Typing
topics.instruction: Type a short paragraph word-for-word, watch punctuation.
sample: I have a dog. It runs fast. I love my dog.
We went to the park and played all afternoon.
My favorite food is rice and beans.

topics.title: Timed Accuracy Drill
topics.instruction: Type as many items correctly in 5 minutes as possible.

topics.title: Top Row Keys
topics.instruction: Practice the top row letters (Q–P) with accuracy.

topics.title: Word Building
topics.instruction: Form and type words using top & home rows.

topics.title: Five 6-letter Words
topics.instruction: Type these 6-letter words to build typing stamina.

topics.title: Drag Shapes
topics.instruction: Drag shapes to their matching outlines with precision.

topics.title: Sentences Practice
topics.instruction: Type the sentences accurately; include punctuation.

topics.title: Speed Words (3 min)
topics.instruction: Type these words quickly over multiple rounds.

topics.title: Paragraph Practice
topics.instruction: Type short paragraphs focusing on punctuation and capitals.
sample: My name is Tola. I like school. I play football.
Every morning I walk to school with friends.
We study and then we play games.

topics.title: Comprehension Typing
topics.instruction: Read short passage, then type summary sentences.
sample: The cat climbed the tall tree. It could not get down.
A farmer grows crops to feed his family and sell the rest.

topics.title: Lower Row Keys
topics.instruction: Practice lower-row letters and punctuation , . / with control.

topics.title: Mixed Row Words
topics.instruction: Type words that use multiple rows together.

topics.title: Five 7-letter Words
topics.instruction: Build strength by typing 7-letter words.

topics.title: Click Challenge
topics.instruction: Click on moving targets quickly and accurately.

topics.title: Sentence Drill
topics.instruction: Type sentences focusing on punctuation and flow.

topics.title: Phrases & Idioms
topics.instruction: Type common phrases and short idioms to expand language.

topics.title: Paragraph Practice
topics.instruction: Type multi-sentence paragraphs carefully and accurately.
sample: Typing is a good skill for school work. We practice often to improve speed and accuracy.
Good handwriting helps when you plan and type your work.

topics.title: Timed Typing Drill
topics.instruction: Type as many provided words as possible in 5 minutes.

topics.title: All Rows Practice
topics.instruction: Practice letters across all rows to build accuracy.

topics.title: Word Mix
topics.instruction: Type mixed words that use letters from all rows.

topics.title: Seven-Letter Words
topics.instruction: Type longer single words to improve reach and speed.

topics.title: Drag & Match
topics.instruction: Drag each item to its matching partner correctly.

topics.title: Right-Click Menu Use
topics.instruction: Practice right-clicking to access context menus and options.

topics.title: Sentence Typing
topics.instruction: Type longer sentences accurately with punctuation.
sample: Learning to type is very useful.
We practice daily to improve our speed.
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

topics.title: Creative Writing (short)
topics.instruction: Type short story sentences ensuring correct grammar.
sample: Once upon a time a child found a small box.
The box held a map to a hidden garden.

topics.title: Story Typing
topics.instruction: Type short stories word for word for fluency practice.
sample: The boy plays in the garden every day.
Our class is learning to use the computer.
Typing fast helps us finish work quickly.

topics.title: Final Timed Drill
topics.instruction: Complete the timed drill focus on accuracy for 5 minutes.

topics.title: Advanced Home Row Practice
topics.instruction: Maintain correct finger positions while increasing speed.

topics.title: Number Keys
topics.instruction: Practice typing the number row with and without shift.

topics.title: Precision Navigation
topics.instruction: Use the mouse to navigate menus and small UI elements.

topics.title: Typing Phrases
topics.instruction: Type common phrases paying attention to punctuation.

topics.title: Mixed Words Speed Drill
topics.instruction: Type longer vocabulary words quickly and accurately.

topics.title: Paragraph Drill
topics.instruction: Type given paragraphs smoothly with accuracy.
sample: Typing skills help us in school and beyond.
We must practice daily to improve our speed.

topics.title: Short Essay Starters
topics.instruction: Type introductory sentences for essays to practice flow.
sample: Technology has changed the way we live.
Education is the key to success.

topics.title: Symbols & Special Characters
topics.instruction: Practice common symbols used in writing and code.

topics.title: Numbers & Symbols Mix
topics.instruction: Type number-symbol combinations quickly.

topics.title: Sentence Drill
topics.instruction: Type sentences including commas and question marks.

topics.title: Speed Paragraph
topics.instruction: Type the paragraph as fast and accurately as possible.
sample: Typing improves when we practice every day.

topics.title: Essay Typing
topics.instruction: Type a short essay of several paragraphs without looking at the keys.
sample: My school is a place where I learn and play.
Typing helps me complete assignments faster.

topics.title: Report Snippets
topics.instruction: Type report-style sentences and headings.

topics.title: Numbers & Special Keys
topics.instruction: Type numbers with shifted symbols for practice.

topics.title: Typing Data Sets
topics.instruction: Practice typing short structured data lines.

topics.title: Complex Sentences
topics.instruction: Type complex sentences including commas and conjunctions.
sample: Although it rained, we played football.
She studied hard, so she passed her exams.
Typing skills require focus and practice.

topics.title: Summaries
topics.instruction: Type short summaries from passage notes.
sample: The passage explains how photosynthesis works.
The story is about a boy who learns responsibility.

topics.title: Report Typing
topics.instruction: Type report-style paragraphs with headings and short contents.
sample:
Title: My Holiday
I visited the beach with my family.

Title: School Project
We worked on a science fair project.

topics.title: Research Snippets
topics.instruction: Type sentences that summarize research findings.
sample: Findings indicate improved performance after training.
Students who practice daily show better accuracy.

topics.title: Typing Accuracy Challenge
topics.instruction: Type longer words and sentences targeting 95% accuracy.

topics.title: Essay Practice
topics.instruction: Type a short 150-word essay or provided prompt.
sample: Write about how you use computers daily.
The role of technology in education.

topics.title: Graphic Design Basics
topics.instruction: Use the mouse to create and adjust simple graphics.

topics.title: Formal Writing
topics.instruction: Type formal letters and format them correctly.

topics.title: Typing Test
topics.instruction: Achieve 25–30 WPM with minimal errors in a timed test.

topics.title: Project Reports
topics.instruction: Type structured project reports including headings and conclusion.

topics.title: Comparative Essays
topics.instruction: Type essays comparing two topics with clear structure.

topics.title: Literature Essays
topics.instruction: Type literary analysis paragraphs with correct citations.
sample: Shakespeare explores themes of fate in Macbeth.
The novel reflects the society of its time.

topics.title: Code Typing Practice
topics.instruction: Type short code snippets correctly (syntax-focused).

topics.title: Photo Editing
topics.instruction: Use the mouse to crop, resize and apply simple edits.

topics.title: Presentation Preparation
topics.instruction: Type clear slide contents and speaker notes.

topics.title: Research Essays
topics.instruction: Type research-based essays summarizing findings.
sample: Renewable energy is the future of power.

topics.title: Debate & Case Studies
topics.instruction: Type debate points and case study summaries clearly.
sample: The company improved sales after the campaign.
The community grew stronger after the project.

topics.title: Evaluation Writing
topics.instruction: Type evaluations noting strengths and weaknesses.
sample: The experiment was successful but had flaws.
The book was informative yet complex.

topics.title: Thesis Writing
topics.instruction: Type thesis-style paragraphs with clear argumentation.
sample: The research aims to investigate the impact of technology on learning.
This study focuses on the effects of social media.

topics.title: Academic Essays
topics.instruction: Type academic-level essays focusing on structure and clarity.
sample: Education reforms are essential for development.

topics.title: UI/UX Precision
topics.instruction: Use mouse to align and adjust interface elements precisely.

topics.title: Final Speed Test
topics.instruction: Complete a timed test aiming for 40+ WPM with high accuracy.
sample: Timed test: type the passages as fast and accurately as possible.

topics.title: Project Documentation
topics.instruction: Type full technical or project documentation with headings.

topics.title: Final Year Essays
topics.instruction: Type longer critical essays and prepare for publication style.
sample: The impact of colonialism in African literature.

topics.title: Professional Reports
topics.instruction: Type business-style reports with clear structure.
